thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 16 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-KPS Q1 EBIT Down At EUR 3.1 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-KPS Q1 EBIT Down At EUR 3.1 Mln
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - KPS AG:
* KPS CONFIRMS ON THE BASIS OF THE RESULT IN THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2017/2018 THE FORECAST FOR SALES AND EARNINGS FOR THE CURRENT BUSINESS YEAR
* AG CONFIRM FORECAST FOR BUSINESS YEAR 2017/2018 * Q1 ‍EARNINGS AFTER TAXES AMOUNTED TO 2.2 MILLION EUROS COMPARED WITH 5.3 MILLION EUROS IN Q1 OF 2016/2017​
* Q1 ‍EBIT CAME DOWN TO 3.1 MILLION EUROS (Q1 2016/2017: 6.4 MILLION EUROS)​
* ‍IN Q1 POSTED A SLIGHT FALL IN SALES TO 38.1 MILLION EUROS (Q1 2016/2017: 40.3 MILLION EUROS)​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
